draw_line_to_bronze_chests.label: Draw lines to bronze coffers
draw_line_to_bronze_chests.tooltip: Render a line from your character's position to nearby bronze coffers, while out of combat.

draw_line_to_silver_chests.label: Draw lines to silver coffers
draw_line_to_silver_chests.tooltip: Render a line from your character's position to nearby silver coffers, while out of combat.
